metadata.Title: CVE-2022-35230 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: An authenticated user can create a link with reflected Javascript codeinside it for the graphs page and send it to other users. The payload canbe executed only with a known CSRF token value of the victim, which ischanged periodically and is difficult to predict.

criterions.comment: zabbix package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
